markdownRemark.html: The resort is located in Puerto Real, a small town 10 minutes from Cádiz, 20 minutes from the Hotel Vincci Resort Costa Golf Course, and just 2 kilometers from the sea. The 18 holes golf course is beautiful, very well cared for and attended. The course is one of the few found in southern Spain with Bermuda grass.

frontmatter.title: Villa Nueva Golf Resort
frontmatter.description: Villa Nueva Golf Resort - The resort is located in Puerto Real, a small town 10 minutes from Cádiz, 20 minutes from the Hotel Vincci Resort Costa Golf Course, and just 2 kilometers from the sea. The 18 holes golf course is beautiful, very well cared for and attended. The course is one of the few found in southern Spain with Bermuda grass.
frontmatter.address: Avda. Vía Augusta 1, 11518, Barrio Jarana Puerto Real (Cádiz), Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 71.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 71.00 euros
